edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151
Enum BoardDirection

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<BoardDirection>
      edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151.BoardDirection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BoardDirection>
public enum BoardDirection
extends java.lang.Enum<BoardDirection>

The BoardDirection class stores a pair of row/column offsets that indicate an ordinal direction on the Board grid. The class also contains a number of helpful static attributes for the 8 compass directions, plus a "STAYPUT" direction that has 0 offsets.
